_comment: Settings json for the Network Connection Monitoring app

output_path._comment: Where do you want your output log files to be kept. Default is your home folder

output_pattern._comment: Output file name format, you can use string formats

runtime_interval._comment: What will be the interval between the two runs, in seconds

runtime_overall._comment: How long will the process run for, in seconds

servers._comment: Servers you want to check the connections to, name:address
